item.title: Hashicorp Vault max_ttl killed my Spring app
item.description: Image by Maike und Björn Bröskamp from pixabay TL;DR Spring Cloud Vault does not renew your dynamic database secret which leaves the application in a broken state when these credentials expire. There are following options: Use a long enough max_ttl and redeploy/restart the application often enough If needed, increase the Vault system max time-to-live Restart the Spring Boot application when the database secret expires
